overview: Now, the former WBC world welterweight champion returns to action, as he faces Sebastian Formella live from the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles on Saturday night. The bout will be a WBC/IBF welterweight title eliminator, meaning Porter will be watching the unified champ Spence vs. Danny Garcia on Nov. 21 intently if he could get past Formella first.
title: Shawn Porter vs. Sebastian Formella
